Message:
“Your power to
shield away flames...
Wasn’t that your
mother’s power?”

Then, she said
“It will all be alright”
because...she was
protecting me...?

Mother gave her life
to protect me...
Back then, and now...
This whole time...!

...! I’m sorry for
not understanding
what you meant...!
Thank you for protecting me...!

But...I wanted you to
survive too, Mother...!

The feeling stirring
in my chest became
a light that spread over
everything around us.

“It’s not hot anymore.”
The girl’s words made
a tear slide down my cheek.

Escaping the fire with her,
others began to follow us,
one after another.

“I won’t let any more
lives be lost...!”

Seeing us all
shrouded in flames,
the soldiers began
to back away with
horrified looks
on their faces.

Mother...
From now on,
I’ll use the power
you protected me with
to save as many lives
as I can...!
